products.name: Lightweight Jacket
products.description: Show off your love for Next.js and Vercel with this unique, limited edition t-shirt. This design is part of a limited run, numbered drop at the June 2021 Next.js Conf. It features a unique, handcrafted triangle design. Get it while supplies last - only 200 of these shirts will be made! All proceeds will be donated to charity.
products.descriptionHtml: Show off your love for Next.js and Vercel with this unique, limited edition t-shirt. This design is part of a limited run, numbered drop at the June 2021 Next.js Conf. It features a unique, handcrafted triangle design. Get it while supplies last – only 200 of these shirts will be made! All proceeds will be donated to charity.
